sequence.name: Standard Server Task Sequence
sequence.description: A complete task sequence for deploying a server operating system

step.name: Opt In to CEIP and WER
Add mass storage drivers to sysprep.inf for XP and 2003
Add mass storage drivers to sysprep.inf for XP and 2003
Configure - Set Administrator Autologon in Domain
Install ConfigMgr Prereqs
step.description: Install BITS, Remote Differential Compression, Web Server, and additional NET features

step.name: Configure - Set AD permissions for ConfigMgr
Configure - Open Firewall for SQL Server Communication
Configure - Set SQL Server Memory Usage
